name: @fils/ui
description: Fil Studio UI library written in TypeScript
author: fil studio <hello@fil.studio>

scripts.build: node build.js && tsc && cp src/bundle.min.css lib/
scripts.dev: chokidar 'src/scss/**/*.scss' -c 'sass src/scss/main.scss:src/bundle.css && cleancss -o src/bundle.min.css src/bundle.css && cp src/bundle.min.css lib/ && echo "scss compiled"'
